customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "You will be acknowledged as an Advanced player if you clear this challenge. Allow me, then, to deal on behalf of Prince. Let us begin!"
<color=#ccbfad>Complete Ascension Challenges to keep increasing your Player Level and unlock more rewards</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Starting Lineup:</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Reserve Lineup:</color>

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Distintivo del giocatore avanzato
customize.desc:
Those who play Genius Invokation TCG often and complete the Advanced Player Trial match will obtain this Player Badge.

Many are those who become players, but the vast majority treat the game as a sort of pastime, and so those who become Advanced Players are few and far between.

Even games do provide the dedicated with unique rewards.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Now that's unexpected. You've really risen through the ranks, haven't you? Come then. Complete this challenge and take your place as an Expert player!"
<color=#ccbfad>Complete Ascension Challenges to keep increasing your Player Level and unlock more rewards</color>

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Distintivo del giocatore esperto
customize.desc:
Those who study the art of playing Genius Invokation TCG and clear the Expert Player Trial match will obtain this Player Badge.

Perhaps your attitude at this point is markedly different from when you first began, but you still find new joy in playingâ€”
In willingly putting time into something you find interesting, and in enjoying all that comprises that which you love.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Interesting, very interesting indeed. I never would have thought that the beginner from back then would already be a challenger for the rank of Master."
<color=#ccbfad>Complete Ascension Challenges to keep increasing your Player Level and unlock more rewards</color>

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna

It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Distintivo del giocatore maestro
customize.desc:
Those who reach the level at which they may complete the Master player Trial shall receive this Player Badge.

They say that few are the players who can obtain this badge, and each of them has their own unique take on the game.

Victory, it seems, may no longer be the sole object here.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow?" "Are you sure you want to take the challenge to be a Legend-rank player? This will be your toughest test yet, since the final trial requires you to vanquish all the tough opponents that you've challenged before and claim ultimate victory..."
<color=#ccbfad>Complete Ascension Challenges to keep increasing your Player Level and unlock more rewards</color>

customize.name: Distintivo del giocatore leggendario
customize.desc:
Those who clear the Legend Player Trial will obtain this Player Badge.

This badge proves that you are well on your way to carving out your own unique mythos as a player.

Go forth, go beyond, and reach new heights!
